resources.string: Nice to meet you! Come join our community!
We want help your neighborhood improve life!
You can add announcements to the notice board, check the calendar of events, have quick access to the contacts you need and much more!
We invite you to complete the survey
Do you think that the infrastructure in the neighborhood is sufficient?
Would you like to have more attractions in the neighborhood?
Is the availability of public transportation in the neighborhood adequate for your needs?
Are there any noise-related issues in the neighborhood that bother you?
Do you have easy access to healthcare facilities in the neighborhood?
Scrollable content for the survey questions
